text: The Alvord Desert is a desert located in Harney County, in southeastern Oregon in the western United States. It is roughly southeast of Steens Mountain.Corning, Howard M. Dictionary of Oregon History. Binfords & Mort Publishing, 1956. The Alvord Desert is a dry lake bed and averages of rain a year. Two mountain ranges separate it from the Pacific Oceanâ€”the Coast Range, and the Cascade Mountains. The Alvord Desert is at an elevation of about . ==References== Category:Geography of Oregon Category:Deserts of North America
title: Alvord Desert
